name: Silencer
description:
The target is in the fortune cookie.

This game was made with RPG Maker MV and uses all the default controls in the engine. F4 to enter or exit full screen, space is the action button, F5 restarts the game, there's mouse and controller support, etc. Please alert me if there are any issues with the Mac or Linux versions, I've only tested it on Windows.

This is my first game I'm putting on itch! It can be fully completed in under twenty minutes. Let me know what you think.
